attributes.additional_details: i have no life, i cant see anyone in my family as i have no time, i cannot see them on weekends as i now work so that i can pay for my train to and from college. people now a days want so much from people ages 13+ when we are trying our hardest to make everyone happy when we cant even make ourselves happy.Many students now a days have their lifes filled with homework or coursework which is wrong, i believe that students should be able to live their lives while they are young. Students cant process a lot of information at once.
attributes.background: I wake up at 5:50am to get the train at 7 to get into college to finish previous the previous coursework/assignment, i then have a 8 hour college day and then given 2 more assignments that have to be completed within 2 weeks but have homework and coursework due in every day which takes me all night
